price: (Nimumara kwambuka) ureke inyanja igume uko iri ituje. Mu by’ukuri (Farawo n’ingabo ze) baraza kurohama.”
arabic: وَٱتۡرُكِ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ رَهۡوًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّغۡرَقُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'ruki al-baḥra rahwan innahum jundun mugh'raqūna
